item.title: CVE-2023-44160|2024-07-15T20:32:04.510Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%2015
item.description: Sensitive information manipulation due to cross-site request forgery. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect 15 (Linux, Windows) before build 35979.
